p.d: One day, Zano suggests to his partner NaIma that they cross France and Spain to go to Algiers and discover, at last, the land that their parents once fled from. Almost out of defiance, with music as their only luggage, these two children of exile set out on the road. Directed by: Tony Gatlif (France, 2004) Cast: Romain Duris (Zano), Lubna Azabal (NaIma), Leila Makhlouf (LeIla), Zouhir Gacem (SaId), Habib Cheik (Habib) Genre: drama Awards: Award for best production (Cannes, 2004) Parental guidance: TV-PG
